definition: to betray one's party/to defect (from the communist party)/renegade faction

sentences.english: Alex was sentenced to death for apostasy.
sentences.chinese: 亞歷克斯因叛黨而被判處死刑。

sentences.english: The politician defected from his own party and joined the opposition.
sentences.chinese: 那個政客叛黨，加入了反對黨。

sentences.english: His defection from the party dim his political career.
sentences.chinese: 他的叛黨使得他政治前途黯淡。
